Monitor<V> - Interface in net.varkhan.base.management.monitor
A monitored value.

A value point that reflects the state of a monitored process or resource.

MonitorAggregate<C extends java.lang.Enum<C>,V,T> - Interface in net.varkhan.base.management.monitor
An aggregate monitor, linked to several component monitors.

A monitor that links a main monitored value point to several named components, either source or product of the main value.
